segments.text: Hello . Could you have a taxi pick me up before 10:00 a . m . ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I stay at No . 115 Fucking Road .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , a taxi will be there by 9:30 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is RIB 10 yuan initially and 2 yuan for each kilometer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a lot of luggage . Will those fit in the taxi ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take it easy . I'll send a larger to pick you up .
segments.speaker: S2
